alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 12:01AM CDT until July 11 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greeley County in central Nebraska... Valley County in central Nebraska... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1201 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Loup, or 11 miles east of Ord, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Greeley around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Spalding. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
